description: Try our easy to follow 3 Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: 3 Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble cake; Whip cream until soft peaks form. Empty frosting into a bowl and gently fold in cream. Spread top of each cake with frosting and place on top of each other. Cover sides with frosting. Dip bases of cherries into melted white chocolate and arrange on top of cake. Note: Put chocolate cake at the bottom, strawberry flavoured cake in the middle and vanilla cake on top.
